Sorcerian: Apprentice of Seven Star Magic

name: Sorcerian: Shichisei Mahou no Shito
summary: Another remake of the classic RPG Sorcerian this time exclusive to the SEGA Dreamcast. Once again you must take control of a party of 4 player-created adventurers and lead them through 10 scenarios from the original game and 5 new ones specially designed for this version in a side-scrolling fashion, each featuring a unique stand-alone quest for you to complete.
